name: Obsidian Mist
description:
Control Scheme:

Left Click: Click anywhere on the map to move there.
Right Click: Right click item cubes to pick them up, right click enemies to attack them.
I: Open / Close Inventory, left click item icon to equip, left click red square to discard item.
U: Unequip all items.
A/D: Rotate camera.
Scroll Wheel: Zoom.

Guide:

Explore the island, fight enemies, and collect gear as you make progress. How you play is up to you. Items on the map are represented by purple cubes with names above them. Under the item's name is there damage and armour modifiers (Damage, Armour).
